description: The one you have been waiting for! The largest unit in Winchester Estates with 2185 sq ft, 4 bdrms, 4 bthrms, providing the spacious feel of a single-family home. Best location in the complex~ this prime hilltop spot offers privacy & stunning city & North Shore mountains views. Open flr plan has soaring vaulted ceiling in the great rm & kitchen with white cabinetry, island, S/S appliances, including induction range. Balcony off the dining area is perfect for year-round barbequing. Up includes 3 bdrms, featuring a large primary suite with walk-in closet & 5-piece ensuite. Unwind & enjoy views of the ski hill & city lights! Bsmnt has a rec room, large bdrm, 4 pc bth, wine rm/flex space & tons of storage. Head out to the private patio & gardens. Double garage, new H/W/T ~ great community!
